Class SalesforceReactActivity

extends ReactActivity

      • shouldAuthenticate

        public boolean shouldAuthenticate()
        Returns if authentication should be performed automatically or not.
        Returns:
        True - if you want login to happen as soon as activity is loaded, False - otherwise.
